blog.name: captain-rusticle
blog.title: ✨d e p r e s s i o n✨
blog.description: uh i pretty much do whatever i feel like here, everything from memes to poetry to fanart to philosophy to weirdass things me and my friends/teachers say. uhh i'm gen z, so i don't rly get offended at too much. feel free to speak your mind here, but i do have opinions and am not afraid to voice them. i'm a friend to whoever needs one tho, regardless of what religion/sexuality/gender/political party you are. im also a fangirl so like, if you wanna talk i'm down for it.

Someone: no he won't he's stupid and he's gonna die
Me, internally: maybe YOU'RE gonna die

With Thanos dead, Nebula is uncertain about herself and her future. All that’s left is to take hope by the hand and let it lead her forward.

title: Deadweight in Crossfire
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2u0aSUd

by QueenOfGathering

“Kinda glad both of us has no regard for our health.” Tony thought of you. He speculated that he’s the most careless about his well-being than anyone on the team, until you managed to have running temperature before the stint even started.

Tony Stark: NO STEVE! FUCK FUCK SHIT FUCK HOLY SHIT HOLY FUCKING SHIT...
body:
Steve Rogers: *is dying heroically in Avengers: Endgame*
Tony Stark: NO STEVE! FUCK FUCK SHIT FUCK HOLY SHIT HOLY FUCKING SHIT DON'T LEAVE ME YOU BITCH ASS MOTHERFUCKER
Steve: *smiles softly* Tony... *acts like he's gonna say something emotional* Language. *dies*

blog.name: petersoftieparker
blog.title: Peter Parker Is Typing 💬
blog.description: morgan | 16 | peter parker fanatic | 1940’s Bucky Barnes is superior |

summary:
Mr. Stark: What the hell did you do to your suit! 
Peter: what do you mean? I didn’t do anything to it.
Mr. Stark: don’t you...
body:
Mr. Stark: What the hell did you do to your suit!

Peter: what do you mean? I didn’t do anything to it.

Mr. Stark: don’t you dare lie to me! It’s black, with spray paint. Freakin’ spray paint! Do you know how much that suit costs?!

Peter: Mr. Stark, that’s not my suit…

Mr. Stark: damn right! It’s my suit and I want it back!

Peter: no, it’s Miles’ suit.

Mr. Stark: You gave the suit away?!

Peter: NO omg listen for once, Jesus Christ

Mr. Stark: you’re gonna meet Jesus Christ if you gave my suit away.

Peter added Miles Morales

Peter: Mr. Stark this is Miles, Miles this is Mr. Stark

Peter: Miles explain what happened

Miles: I’m from a different universe

Mr. Stark: wtf

Peter: Miles is Spider-Man in a different universe

Miles: in my universe, Tony Stark is a homeless man

Mr. Stark: WHAT?!

Peter: what am I in your universe?

Miles: dead

Mr. Stark: whAT!!!

Peter: lol sucks for him

Miles: rip haha he got yeeted by Kingpin

Mr. Stark: there are two of you..

Mr. Stark: I need a drink

Mr. Stark has left the chat

Miles: f

Peter: f 😔✊🏼

blog.name: quellthefire
blog.title: quell the fire
blog.description: Martha • she/her • 27 • Pansexual/Queer • Marvel ships: Stony, Stucky, Winterfalcon, Frostiron, Symbrock • Still trying to recover from The Magicians season finale. Queliot will always be endgame • Find me on AO3

summary: All I do is drink coffee and say bad words
body:
All I do is drink coffee and say bad words

Fic prompt from @e3105eb

So I’m apparently a doofus, because they asked for Stucky and I spaced out and wrote Winteriron. But it turned out so good that I’m posting it anyway. (If you send another prompt I’ll do Stucky for real this time. Sorry I’m so spacey!)

“All I do is drink coffee and say bad words.”

Tony cradled his favorite mug in his hands and glanced at Bucky, a smug expression on his face.

Bucky, to his credit, only sighed and poured more coffee into the mug, leaving just enough room for the splash of cream Tony always added.

“You teared up last week when Peter showed you his grade card. That’s hardly the makings of a badass.” It was too goddamn early for this, Bucky thought to himself.

Tony made a disgruntled noise, and said “That’s different. Some might even argue it’s the most badass, because I’m subverting cultural expectations of traditional masculinity.”

“And that video yesterday? How does forcing me to watch a baby turtle eat berries factor into this subversive badass theory?”

Tony’s eyes narrowed, “It’s a good thing you’re so hot, Buck. You’re on thin fucking ice.”

Bucky grinned, and leaned down to kiss the top of his head. “You were right about the saying bad words at least. And we both know you’re the hot one in this relationship.”

Bucky, to his credit, only sighed and poured more coffee into the mug, leaving just enough room for the splash of cream Tony always added.

“You teared up last week when Peter showed you his grade card. That’s hardly the makings of a badass.” It was too goddamn early for this, Bucky thought to himself.

Tony made a disgruntled noise, and said “That’s different. Some might even argue it’s the most badass, because I’m subverting cultural expectations of traditional masculinity.”

“And that video yesterday? How does forcing me to watch a baby turtle eat berries factor into this subversive badass theory?”

Tony’s eyes narrowed, “It’s a good thing you’re so hot, Buck. You’re on thin fucking ice.”

Bucky grinned, and leaned down to kiss the top of his head. “You were right about the saying bad words at least. And we both know you’re the hot one in this relationship.”
trail.content:
All I do is drink coffee and say bad words

Fic prompt from @e3105eb

So I’m apparently a doofus, because they asked for Stucky and I spaced out and wrote Winteriron. But it turned out so good that I’m posting it anyway. (If you send another prompt I’ll do Stucky for real this time. Sorry I’m so spacey!)

“All I do is drink coffee and say bad words.”

Tony cradled his favorite mug in his hands and glanced at Bucky, a smug expression on his face.

Bucky, to his credit, only sighed and poured more coffee into the mug, leaving just enough room for the splash of cream Tony always added.

“You teared up last week when Peter showed you his grade card. That’s hardly the makings of a badass.” It was too goddamn early for this, Bucky thought to himself.

Tony made a disgruntled noise, and said “That’s different. Some might even argue it’s the most badass, because I’m subverting cultural expectations of traditional masculinity.”

“And that video yesterday? How does forcing me to watch a baby turtle eat berries factor into this subversive badass theory?”

Tony’s eyes narrowed, “It’s a good thing you’re so hot, Buck. You’re on thin fucking ice.”

Bucky grinned, and leaned down to kiss the top of his head. “You were right about the saying bad words at least. And we both know you’re the hot one in this relationship.”

title: The Perk’s Living with Captain Steve Rogers

read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2HhimtJ

by ingenious221B

Teddy Jones is ten years old when he recently lost his only living relatives, his grandmother. He thought he would live in some group home or foster care, but then he never thought he got a living family, and it turns out to be Captain America.

blog.name: that-random-awkward-nerdy-kid
blog.title: Leigha Marie
blog.description: I am just a nerdy kid going to college in a city but am from the middle of nowhere. I love Disney movies, Marvel comics, and almost anything of the Science Fiction genre. I have dyslexia and am on the autistic spectrum. I was in foster care, but was adopted. I am very introverted. Yeah, that’s basically me.

tags: reasons i have very little friends
summary: This popped up in my facebook memories. I spazzed on old friend in the comments because they thought we got a Iron Man 4 and...
body:
This popped up in my facebook memories. I spazzed on old friend in the comments because they thought we got a Iron Man 4 and Black Widow tv show already. this is probably part of the reason I lost that friend. I love see old memories because I can see how much I changed and how what I want changed. I still wish we got the Black Widow movie, but i am happy with what we got for Tony Stark even if it wasn’t a movie. The Iron Man story feel like it is naturally ending.

We have seen Tony Stark so much. He is a character that we have seen grow a lot. He was the start of the MCU. This is why I think he will be one of the ones to die. His death will feel like closing a part of the story a end of a chapter. I also think he has a lot to lose which will mean it will hurt if he died. To me, Tony’s death will have more meaning at this point. I honestly think more than one avenger will die, but I think Tony will be one of the ones to die. We also better get that Black Widow movie now. If we don’t I am going to be pissed.
